>
[Mud Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1514)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clay vessel launches gobs of clinging mud and grit. A mud bomb deals the listed bludgeoning damage and [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage. On a critical hit, the target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the start of your next turn. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.
